app_detail:
가질 수 있는 손전등 중에 가장 빠르고 밝은, 그리고 가장 편리한 손전등! 필요할 때에 결코 가져오는 것을 잊지 않을 것입니다!

가장 우아한 디자인과 가장 빠른 시작으로, 진짜 손전등을 정말 능가합니다. 완전히 무료입니다! 지금 자신의 손전등 가지세요! 그것의 모든 헌신으로 빛날 것입니다!

기능：

- 전화를 받을 때 멋있는 화면 플래시.
- 가장 밝은 조명기.
- 가장 빠른 시작.
- 우아한 디자인.
- 캠 조명을 사용합니다.

#1 Flashlight App, Super bright LED Flashlight!

The brightest, fastest, and most handy flashlight you will ever have! One that you will never forget to bring when you need it most! Besides, it is designed to support all android devices and simply uses the camera flash and LED!!

With the most elegant design and the fastest startup, it definitely outruns a real flashlight. Get your own Flashlight now! It'll shine with its all light! Just like a mobile torch, with this FREE APP you'll be able to add brightness to any situation! Tell a friend and play a FREE GAME of flashlight tag!

Main features include:
- The brightest flashlight ever.
- Fastest startup flashlight.
- Elegant design.
- Use the cam light.

What‘s more, it is better than a free app that gives you a free bright light at night with the brightest flashlight? Light your torch now! It may not be a free game, but it's one of the best free flashlight apps ever!

Please note that Brightest Flashlight - LED Light uses following permissions 
1.Read contacts - only used to show contacts in screen flash;
2.Directly call phone numbers- only used for call assistant feature to call back.
3.Read phone status - only used for call flash feature to know your phone status and show screen flash precisely.
4.Camera - only used to turn ON/OFF your device's camera flashlight.
